errors.error_description: Specified outdated Python 2.7 requirement when modern projects should use Python 3.x
correction_candidates: This project requires Python 3.8+ for optimal performance and modern library compatibility
This project works with Python 3.6 or higher, with Python 3.9+ recommended
Remove the Python version requirement entirely as it's not specified elsewhere
This project requires Python 3.7-3.11 for compatibility with all dependencies
errors.golden_answer: This project requires Python 3.8+ for optimal performance and modern library compatibility
